content: Mo worries, Loomi Co. has arranged a temporary place for you to stay. More importantly, you'll definitely love the place <style=PlayerName>{me}</style> is going to pick for you.
info: 带回营地-伊佐奇-复杂对话_主流程文本II
带回营地-伊佐奇-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: {A抱歉}My name is Isaki Koko—Uh, um, sorry... I-I'm a bit nervous, let me start over. I'm <style=NpcName>Isaki</style>. It's a pleasure to meet you.
info: 带回营地-伊佐奇-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: I could sleep under a tree, mm! Hmm? Or should I burrow a hole to sleep in...? {A发抖}Mm-hmm, mm-hmm. Hmm, that probably won't work either, right?
info: 带回营地-伊佐奇-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: {A想到了}A place to live? You mean one of those buildings with a roof? It's been so long since I've slept under one of those. Thaaank you, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>.
info: 带回营地-伊佐奇-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: Ah, so here you are, hoho~! I'm Mobai. It's great to meet you. Have you decided where you're going to live? About the house...
info: 带回营地-伊佐奇-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: Hoho, then <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, please take this <style=Highlight>Building Kit</style> for Isaki. You can place it in a suitable <style=Highlight>location</style>.
info: 带回营地-伊佐奇-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: Hoho?! I didn't expect everyone to be so happy to be here. I'm glad you've got some more companions. So, where's this new neighbor of yours...?
info: 带回营地-伊佐奇-复杂对话_主流程文本II
